CustomField.description: This field is mapped to hubspot
CustomField.label: Change Competency - Organization

value.fullName: It's used ad hoc or we don't use it at all
value.label: It's used ad hoc or we don't use it at all

value.fullName: It's used on multiple projects but without a comprehensive approach in the organization
value.label: It's used on multiple projects but without a comprehensive approach in the organization

value.fullName: We've defined an approach to change using a specific methodology across all aspects of our organization
value.label: We've defined an approach to change using a specific methodology across all aspects of our organization

value.fullName: Change management standards are a formal part of our business processes at all levels
value.label: Change management standards are a formal part of our business processes at all levels
